recipes.name: Spicy Mediterranean-Style Brown Lentil & Tomato Soup
recipes.description: A bold and zesty twist on the classic lentil soup, featuring fresh tomatoes and a spicy kick of red pepper flakes.
recipes.ingredients_available: Olive oil, salt, pepper, dried thyme, bay leaves, garlic powder
recipes.ingredients_needed: 1 lb dry brown lentils, 2 large carrots, 2 stalks celery, 1 large yellow onion, 2 large fresh tomatoes, 1 tsp red pepper flakes, 6 cups vegetable broth, 1 bunch fresh parsley
recipes.reason: Added fresh tomatoes for brightness and red pepper flakes to meet the user's request for a spicy flavor profile while keeping the dish vegetarian.
recipes.instructions:
1. Finely dice the onion, carrots, and celery. Core and chop the fresh tomatoes.
2. Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Sauté the onion, carrots, and celery for 8 minutes until softened.
3. Add the chopped tomatoes and 1 tsp red pepper flakes to the pot. Sauté for another 3 minutes until the tomatoes begin to break down.
4. Rinse 1 lb lentils and add to the pot along with 1 tsp dried thyme, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, and 2 bay leaves.
5. Pour in 6 cups vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-35 minutes until lentils are tender.
6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Remove bay leaves and stir in 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Curried Red Lentil and Spinach Soup
recipes.description: A vibrant, quick-cooking soup using red lentils that break down into a creamy texture, flavored with warm Indian spices.
recipes.ingredients_available: Coconut oil (or vegetable oil), curry powder, turmeric, cumin, salt, red pepper flakes
recipes.ingredients_needed: 2 cups dry red lentils, 1 large onion, 3 cloves garlic, 1 inch fresh ginger, 5 oz fresh baby spinach, 1 can coconut milk
recipes.reason: Red lentils cook very quickly, making this an ideal choice for a faster dinner with a creamy, spicy profile.
recipes.instructions:
1. Finely chop the onion, garlic, and ginger.
2. Sauté onion in oil for 5 minutes; add garlic and ginger for 1 more minute.
3. Stir in 1 tbsp curry powder, 1 tsp turmeric, and 1 tsp cumin.
4. Add 2 cups rinsed red lentils and 5 cups water. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until lentils dissolve.
5. Stir in 1 can coconut milk and 5 oz baby spinach until wilted.
6. Season with salt and a pinch of red pepper flakes.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Lemon Lentil Soup (Shorbat Adas)
recipes.description: A bright and zesty yellow lentil soup blended for smoothness and finished with plenty of fresh lemon juice.
recipes.ingredients_available: Olive oil, cumin, salt, black pepper
recipes.ingredients_needed: 2 cups dry yellow (or red) lentils, 1 large onion, 2 medium potatoes, 3 lemons, 1 bunch fresh cilantro
recipes.reason: The addition of potatoes and lemon provides a unique texture and a refreshing citrus punch compared to traditional savory soups.
recipes.instructions:
1. Peel and cube the potatoes; dice the onion.
2. Sauté onion in olive oil until translucent. Add 1 tbsp cumin and the cubed potatoes.
3. Add 2 cups rinsed lentils and 7 cups water.
4. Simmer for 25-30 minutes until potatoes and lentils are very soft.
5. Use an immersion blender to partially blend the soup until thick but slightly textured.
6. Stir in the juice of 3 lemons and 1/2 cup chopped cilantro just before serving.

recipes.name: Italian Lentil and Kale Soup
recipes.description: A rustic Mediterranean soup packed with leafy greens, diced tomatoes, and robust Italian herbs.
recipes.ingredients_available: Olive oil, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic, balsamic vinegar
recipes.ingredients_needed: 1.5 cups dry green lentils, 1 bunch kale, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 large onion, 2 carrots, 1 box vegetable broth
recipes.reason: The kale and tomatoes add a nutritional boost and a pleasant acidity that balances the lentils.
recipes.instructions:
1. Dice onion and carrots. Remove stems from kale and chop the leaves.
2. Sauté onion and carrots in olive oil for 6 minutes. Add 3 cloves minced garlic for 1 minute.
3. Add 1.5 cups lentils, 1 can diced tomatoes (with juice), 1 tsp oregano, and 1 tsp basil.
4. Pour in 6 cups vegetable broth. Simmer for 35-40 minutes until lentils are tender.
5. Stir in the chopped kale and cook for 3 minutes until tender.
6. Finish with a splash of balsamic vinegar to brighten the flavors.

recipes.name: Smoky Lentil and Sweet Potato Soup
recipes.description: A thick, smoky soup using pimentón (smoked paprika) and sweet potatoes for a sweet and savory dinner.
recipes.ingredients_available: Olive oil, smoked paprika, cumin, salt, hot sauce
recipes.ingredients_needed: 1.5 cups brown lentils, 2 large sweet potatoes, 1 red bell pepper, 1 onion, 1 box vegetable broth
recipes.reason: Sweet potatoes offer a different vegetable base that pairs perfectly with the smokiness of the paprika.
recipes.instructions:
1. Dice the onion, bell pepper, and peel/cube the sweet potatoes.
2. Sauté onion and bell pepper in olive oil for 7 minutes.
3. Add 1 tbsp smoked paprika and 1 tsp cumin.
4. Stir in the sweet potatoes, 1.5 cups lentils, and 6 cups vegetable broth.
5. Simmer for 30 minutes or until the sweet potatoes are fork-tender and lentils are soft.
6. Mash a few sweet potato chunks against the side of the pot to thicken the broth. Season with salt and hot sauce.
